name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions and managing cloud infrastructure. Proficient in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, with extensive skills in CI/CD automation using **GitHub Actions**, **Jenkins**, and **GitLab CI**. Strong background in monitoring and observability using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **ELK**, ensuring high availability and security across cloud-native applications. Adept at building and deploying scalable systems, with practical experience in scripting with **Python** and **Bash**, and a solid understanding of networking and security protocols.

Expertise in developing enterprise platforms that leverage AI-assisted tools for real-time analytics and automation, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about creating secure, maintainable solutions that drive impactful results, while effectively communicating within teams and stakeholders.
